name: Don't (Eli)
description:
:

Don't is a 2D story-telling game with an element of platformer, which tells the story of Mush. A young forest creature, whom is at that age where it has to make an "important" decision.

If you are curious about what decisions Mush has to make, try out the game!

Showscase video: 

Features:

  • 2D platformer, controls with "WASD".
  • Mouse controller, the character will follow the mouse.
  • Interactive fiction.
